main event: Observers sighted an unidentified object low in the sky in the east or southeast. The object seemed to loop, hover, and move fast at times, going from east to south then rising in the sky to nearly overhead.
interesting points: The object appeared to change colors, going from red (blinking) to green to white.
At times, the brilliance of the object seemed to take on a saucer-like appearance.
Radar at Plattsburgh AFB said the object was around 35,000 ft.
A KC-135 aircraft number 836 was in the area at the time of the sighting, with its red rotating beacons and white and green navigation lights on.
There was an apparent meteorological display, with the observers seeing shooting stars in the east sky just after the object disappeared.
result: explained (as the aircraft lights of KC-135 aircraft number 836)
